backend/main.mo: Defines the main backend canister with storage mixins, authorization, cruise data models, bookings, reviews, alerts, branding settings, and in-memory maps for all entities.
feature_evidence.json: Lists features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels for build and deployment evidence tracking.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for various frontend source files describing their roles and behaviors.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component that detects share links and renders either the shared itinerary view or the standard home layout.
Displays toast notifications for unviewed admin booking alerts when the user is an admin.
frontend/src/components/AdminDashboardDi: Admin dashboard dialog showing alerts, bookings, cruise line logos, and branding settings with automatic alert marking.
frontend/src/components/AdminSettingsDia: Admin dialog showing current user role, principal ID, and allows assigning admin privileges using role mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/BookingModal.tsx: Booking modal letting users select cabins, calculate total cost, and submit a booking for a cruise itinerary.
frontend/src/components/CruiseCard.tsx: Displays a cruise deal card with images, details, itinerary access, and favorite management.
frontend/src/components/CruiseLineLogosM: Admin interface to add, edit, preview, and delete cruise line logos with image upload handling.
frontend/src/components/CruiseLinePartne: Public section that displays all cruise line partner logos or loading placeholders.
Dialog listing a user's favorite cruise deals with loading states and fallback messaging.
frontend/src/components/FeaturedDeals.ts: Featured deals section showing carousel of highlighted cruise deals with auto-scroll and error handling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with navigation links, social icons, branding, and a copyright note.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Provides the sticky site header with navigation, auth handling, admin tools, and dialogs for favorites and bookings.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Displays the homepage hero section with a background image, headline, action buttons, and feature highlights.
Shows a detailed cruise itinerary dialog with reviews, booking, sharing, and PDF generation features.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Prompts new authenticated users to enter their name and saves their profile.
frontend/src/components/ReviewSection.ts: Manages viewing, submitting, editing, and deleting cruise reviews with rating controls and authentication checks.
frontend/src/components/SearchSection.ts: Search UI for cruises with text input, filters, and result listing using cruise deals data and query hooks.
frontend/src/components/SharedItineraryP: Displays a shared itinerary with branding, loading/error states, and itinerary details loaded via queries.
frontend/src/components/SharedPageBrandi: Admin UI for viewing, editing, and resetting shared page branding settings via queries and mutations.
frontend/src/components/UserBookingsDial: Dialog showing a user's bookings with status, itinerary info, and loading states using query data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, login flow, stored identities, and provider setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating cruise deals, itineraries, user profiles, and filtered searches using an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive custom CSS variables for theming, including ocean and sunset color palettes and dark mode overrides.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, loading global styles.
frontend/src/utils/colorValidation.ts: Validates color strings, returns safe fallbacks, and builds styled color objects with basic CSS format checks.
frontend/src/utils/itineraryPdf.ts: Generates a printable HTML-based PDF window for an itinerary with styled sections and error handling.
frontend/src/utils/sharedItineraryBrandi: Provides default branding values and merges fetched branding settings with those defaults.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, clearing, and managing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theming with custom OKLCH-based colors, components, and plugins.
project_state.json: JSON metadata describing project state, features, issues, and configuration information.
